Directions: Hwy 169 & Briarcliff Pkwy. Just 5 minutes north of downtown across the Broadway Bridge. Hwy 169 exit off of Hwy 29 coming from the North. The market is located in the center of Briarcliff Village next to GreenAcres, Trezo Mare & the Café

Mailing Address: Liberty's Courthouse Square, (Franklin, Main, Kansas, and Water Streets)

Directions: Located at 7th & Armour Road, NKCMO 64116 (adjacent to Dairy Queen, NKC City Hall)

Name:: The Farmers' Community Market at Brookside
Directions: Located at the Border Star Montessori School at 63rd and Wornall Road in Brookside.

Opens Days/Months: May - mid-October*, *Contact market for winter hours and days.
Directions: Located one mile south of I-435 on Holmes Road then east on Red Bridge Road in Minor Park.

Open Days: Summer Farmers’ Market Hours* - March - October; Saturdays 6:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m., Sundays 8:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m., Wednesdays 10:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.
Opens Days/Months: Winter Farmers’ Market Hours* - November - March; Saturdays 7:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m., Sundays 7:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m., Wednesdays 8:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m., *City Market special events may require an early closing.
Directions: From I-35, exit at Broadway. Take 6th Street to Walnut and go north two blocks to 5th Street. Missouri's Market of the Year - 2008, "Where the Locals Go"
Located at Westport Rd.and Wyoming St.

From either I-435 North or South, take the Bannister Road exit. Go west approximately 2.5 miles. Turn right (north) onto Troost Avenue. Turn right at the first stoplight. Located in the Bannister Federal Complex parking lot.

Opens Days/Months: May - October, Youth are providing fresh and healthy vegetables from A to Z.
Directions: Located at 52nd and Paseo Boulevard in Kansas City, Missouri.

Open Days: Saturdays and Sundays 9:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.
Directions: 1 Block West of Blue Ridge Blvd. & 87th Street

Name:: BADSEED Funky Friday Night Farmers’ Market
Opens Days/Months: May - November 20th. *This market operates during the winter. Call or contact the market for winter hours and days.
Directions: In the Crossroads district of Downtown Kansas City

Name:: Grand Court Four Seasons Farmers' Market
Directions: 107th Street and Wornall Road. Just south of I-435 on Wornall.
